snippet.title: Portal Forever Testing: The (probably) Final Update! | portal 2 mod trailer
snippet.description:
Website: https://1995aek.wixsite.com/forever-testing

Gamejolt Page: https://gamejolt.com/games/Portal-Forever-testing/572639

---------------------------

Portal: Forever Testing Is a Fan-created Modification for Valve Software's Portal 2™ containing a variety of custom-built levels for the game.

Originally started in 2019 as a small map-pack for Portal 2™, Portal: Forever Testing has been separated into a stand-alone mod for the game.

The "(probably) Final Update" has majorly improved the maps that were previously available through a wide array of gameplay and audio tweaks, as well as miniature stories being added to most of them.
